title: Wemlin
summary: Locates nearby public transport stops for ZVV, BLT, OSTWIND and Liechtenstein.
description: Traveling without haste in Zurich's Transport Network, with OSTWIND, BLT and Liechtenstein mobilWith a single tap Wemlin displays the departures of any public means of transport for:- Zurich's Transport Network (Zürcher Verkehrsverbund - ZVV) incl. Winterthur and Schaffhausen- BLT (Baselland Transport)- OSTWIND area- Liechtenstein (LIEmobil)Stops can easily be selected from a list or can be found by using „Locate Me“. Times of departure are automatically updated. After selection of transport line, its entire route with departure times is displayed along with possible connections.Functions:- Scheduled departures incl. nighttime schedules of trains, trams, buses and ships- Realtime support for transport units with a connection to the control center- Service alerts for transport units with special support from the control center- "Locate Me" shows any nearby stops- Display of possible connections and their departure times- Define your favorite stations- Direct information with our widget- Management of schedules within the application- Network and nighttime service maps- Works offline too- List of recently used stops- Easy toggling between waiting time and departure time- Supports individual notifications with Android Watch
descriptionHTML:
Traveling without haste in Zurich's Transport Network, with OSTWIND, BLT and Liechtenstein mobil

With a single tap Wemlin displays the departures of any public means of transport for:
- Zurich's Transport Network (Zürcher Verkehrsverbund - ZVV) incl. Winterthur and Schaffhausen
- BLT (Baselland Transport)
- OSTWIND area
- Liechtenstein (LIEmobil)

Stops can easily be selected from a list or can be found by using „Locate Me“. Times of departure are automatically updated. After selection of transport line, its entire route with departure times is displayed along with possible connections.

Functions:
- Scheduled departures incl. nighttime schedules of trains, trams, buses and ships
- Realtime support for transport units with a connection to the control center
- Service alerts for transport units with special support from the control center
- "Locate Me" shows any nearby stops
- Display of possible connections and their departure times
- Define your favorite stations
- Direct information with our widget
- Management of schedules within the application
- Network and nighttime service maps
- Works offline too
- List of recently used stops
- Easy toggling between waiting time and departure time
- Supports individual notifications with Android Watch
comments: This app worked amazing on Windows Phone, but on Android it keeps crashing and blocking my phone. The app starts blinking and the  I only way to make it stop is to force shut down the phone l. I have the latest version of Android on a Moto G5.
Version 2.4.4: Stations do not display after "P" in Zurich. "Locate me" function does not work.
The 'locate me' feature is broken! Please fix asap.

Super innovativer Fahrplan Die App ist eine super Ergänzung zum ZVV Fahrplan. Sehr schön und liebevoll gemacht. UPDATE: naja also due Bedienerführung bei veralteten Fahrplan ("kein Netzwerk an ihrer Position" oder so) könnte man besser machen: es ist zu dem Zeitpunkt ja klar,  dass es ein Netzwerk hier gibt, dass der Fahrplan sogar installiert ist und man ihn updaten muss - > ein update-button sollte an dieser Stelle angezeigt werden.
